# MeldUI

> A Vue 3 component library built on shadcn-vue with Tailwind CSS v4, providing consistent and beautiful UI components.

MeldUI is an internal design system monorepo that re-exports and customizes shadcn components. It consists of three separate packages: `@meldui/vue` for UI components, `@meldui/tabler-vue` for icons, and `@meldui/charts-vue` for data visualization. Uses Tailwind CSS v4 (NOT v3) with CSS-first configuration.

## Critical: Common Mistakes

1. **Using Tailwind CSS v3 syntax** - Do NOT create `tailwind.config.js`. Use CSS-first config with `@import "tailwindcss"`
2. **Wrong icon imports** - Icons are in `@meldui/tabler-vue`, NOT `@meldui/vue`
3. **Wrong chart imports** - Charts are in `@meldui/charts-vue`, NOT `@meldui/vue`
4. **Missing theme import** - Must import `@meldui/vue/themes/default` in your CSS
5. **Missing Tailwind source directive** - Add `@source "../node_modules/@meldui/vue/dist/*.mjs";`

## Components

### Form & Input
- Input - Text input for capturing user input
- Textarea - Multi-line text input
- Select - Custom select with grouping and keyboard navigation
- Checkbox - Checkbox input with label support
- RadioGroup - Radio button group for single selection
- Switch - Toggle switch for boolean values
- Slider - Range slider for numeric values
- NumberField - Numeric input with increment/decrement
- PinInput - PIN code input with individual boxes
- TagsInput - Input for multiple tags
- InputOtp - OTP/verification code input
- FileUpload - File upload with drag and drop
- MultiSelect - Select multiple options from a list
- Mention - @mention input for user tagging
- NativeSelect - Native HTML select element
- InputGroup - Group inputs with addons
- DateRangePicker - Date picker with presets for single or range selection
- Label - Form field labels
- Field - Form field wrapper with validation
- Form - Form wrapper with validation (vee-validate)

### Navigation
- Tabs - Tabbed navigation with line and pill variants
- Breadcrumb - Navigation breadcrumbs
- NavigationMenu - Complex navigation menus
- DropdownMenu - Dropdown menus with nested items
- ContextMenu - Right-click context menus
- Menubar - Horizontal menu bar
- Pagination - Page navigation controls
- Sidebar - Collapsible sidebar navigation

### Data Display
- Card - Container for content with header, content, and footer
- Avatar - User avatar with fallback
- AvatarGroup - Group of avatars with overflow
- Badge - Status badges and labels
- Calendar - Date picker calendar
- RangeCalendar - Date range picker calendar
- Kbd - Keyboard key display
- Table - Basic data table
- DataTable - Advanced data table with server-side operations, filtering, sorting, pagination, row selection, column pinning, and keyboard navigation
- Timeline - Vertical timeline display
- RelativeTime - Relative time display (e.g., "2 hours ago")

### Feedback
- Alert - Alert messages with variants (default, destructive, success, warning, info, neutral)
- Sonner - Toast notifications
- Progress - Progress bar
- CircularProgress - Circular progress indicator
- Skeleton - Loading skeleton placeholders
- Spinner - Loading spinner
- Stepper - Step-by-step progress indicator
- Dot - Status indicator dots
- Empty - Empty state placeholder

### Layout
- Accordion - Collapsible content sections
- AspectRatio - Maintain aspect ratios
- Collapsible - Collapsible content
- Separator - Visual separator line
- ScrollArea - Custom scrollable area
- Resizable - Resizable panels

### Overlay
- Dialog - Modal dialogs
- AlertDialog - Confirmation dialogs
- Sheet - Side panel overlays
- Drawer - Bottom/side drawer overlays
- Popover - Floating content popover
- Tooltip - Hover tooltips
- HoverCard - Rich hover cards

### Interactive
- Button - Buttons with variants (default, destructive, success, warning, info, outline, secondary, ghost, link)
- ButtonGroup - Group of buttons
- Toggle - Toggle button
- ToggleGroup - Group of toggle buttons
- Command - Command palette (cmd+k style)
- Carousel - Image/content carousel
- Combobox - Searchable select with autocomplete

### Utility
- ClipboardCopy - Copy to clipboard button

### Charts (from @meldui/charts-vue)
- MeldLineChart - Line charts for trends
- MeldBarChart - Bar charts for comparisons
- MeldAreaChart - Area charts with fills
- MeldPieChart - Pie charts
- MeldDonutChart - Donut charts
- MeldScatterChart - Scatter plots
- MeldRadarChart - Radar/spider charts
- MeldHeatmapChart - Heatmap visualization
- MeldMixedChart - Combined chart types
- MeldChart - Dynamic chart type wrapper

## Need More Details?

For detailed component documentation, interactive examples, and advanced usage patterns, consult the **MeldUI Storybook**:

**Storybook URL:** https://meldui.github.io/meldui

### What Storybook Provides

| Need | Where to Look in Storybook |
|------|----------------------------|
| All component variants | Navigate to Components > [Category] > [Component] |
| Interactive prop controls | Use the "Controls" panel to test props |
| Complete code examples | View the "Docs" tab for each component |
| Real-world patterns | Stories like `LoginForm`, `DashboardLayout`, `ProfileSettings` |
| DataTable configurations | Components > DataTable (includes Overview docs) |
| Chart configurations | Components > Charts (includes Installation guide) |
| Form validation patterns | Components > Form > [Component] |
| Accessibility info | Check the "Accessibility" panel |

### Storybook Navigation

1. **Docs pages** - MDX documentation with installation, theming, and overview guides
2. **Component stories** - Interactive examples organized by category
3. **Controls panel** - Test different prop combinations
4. **Code snippets** - Copy-paste ready examples from each story

### When to Use Storybook

- Component has many variants or complex props
- Need to understand interaction patterns
- Looking for real-world composition examples
- DataTable column definitions and server-side patterns
- Chart configuration options and color palettes
- Form validation with vee-validate integration
